price: So do not call upon any other god besides Allah, lest you become of those who will be punished.
arabic: فَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
